name: Soft, Moist and Gooey Cinnamon Buns
author: FIONASMOM
summary: I tried long and hard to find the ultimate cinnamon bun recipe for bread machines...this is it. They are so soft and yummy!
ingredients: ½ (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
directions: In a bread machine pan, place the milk, beaten egg, melted butter, water, vanilla pudding mix, bread flour, sugar, salt and yeast in the order recommended by the manufacturer
When cycle is finished, remove the dough, and knead for 3 to 5 minutes
Roll out to a large rectangle
Mix together the softened butter, brown sugar and cinnamon
Sprinkle with chopped walnuts and raisins, if desired
Starting with the widest end, roll the dough into a log
Cut into 1/2 inch to 1 inch slices, and place in a greased 9x13 inch pan
Place in a draft-free space, and allow to rise until doubled
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
To make frosting, mix the milk, confectioners sugar, softened butter and vanilla in a small bowl
